name: Another Wor(k)Ld Shop
description:
In this game made for the Mouse Jam [8 Bits to Infinity] construct another world with provided achitectural piece in order to help small pawn to reach and clean fountains.

Use the provided pieces wisely in order to build path accross those small worlds.

The Mouse Game Jam was a 10 days game jam where only 3 button of the mouse can be used as controll. The theme of Mouse Jam [8 Bits to Infinity] was: Another World
